text: "On the Banks of the Old Ponchartrain" is a 1947 song written by Hank Williams and was his second single released on MGM records. It has been covered by Rose Maddox, Don Gibson, Hank Williams Jr. and Hothouse Flowers. == References == Category:1947 songs Category:Country songs Category:Hank Williams songs Category:Hank Williams Jr. songs
title: On the Banks of the Old Ponchartrain
